title: [综合]REGIONS —— 很好用的领地插件[1.15]
author: 小孩孩
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小孩孩 于 2020-4-1 12:53 编辑 
授权证明◆介绍◆Regions is the ultimate survival plugin for land claiming. It offers a easy to user interface with great features. You can adjust region settings, trusted members and claims all in the menu. There is a clear indication on where you claim is located with a cool looking border.
Regions是一个很不错的领地插件。它提供了简单又实用的玩家界面。你可以在菜单中调整领地设置、受信任的成员和声明。你声明的领地有着清楚的标志，还有很酷的边界特效。

特点：100% 自定义消息 快速的JSON序列化 轻松编辑玩家权限传送到领地每一个区域都有对应生物群系的图标直观的用户界面可以指示玩家位于哪个区域的title（←这里的title还不知道他指的是什么）在菜单中设置领地可以更改/切换的边界粒子商店系统(你必须安装vault) 支持Worldguard(需要安装worldguard)

DependenciesYou can make the most of regions by installing more dependencies:Worldguard (Prevents people from claiming in a spawn area/specific areas you don't want people to claim).Vault (Which allows you to use the region shop system)依赖于：
Worldguard（防止玩家在刷怪区/特殊区域声明领地）
Vault（允许你使用商店系统）
你可以安装这些插件更好地配合这个插件运行（↑这些真的好难翻译，有不合适处请指出）
命令/权限命令：只有一些你需要用的命令/region | 打开领地菜单
/trust | 对一位成员信任，允许在你的领地建造复制代码


权限：玩家只需要一个权限去指定他们有多少声明（←这句话不好翻译，各位可以给个建议）原话：There is only one permission that a player needs is to specify how many claims they need:region.claims.{数字}

例如:
regions.claims.10

将会给你10个声明复制代码（↑这些我真的译得很懵逼）
配置文件The only thing that you will have to configure are the messages. The regions plugin will work out of the box without needing any changes made to the configuration.
唯一需要配置的就是消息了。这个插件装上即用，无须更改配置。
Messages:
  general-permission: You do not seem to have permissions for that command.
  general-usage: 'Usage: &f{usage}'
  offline-player-null: The player &f{player} &7has never played before..
  prefix: '&a&lRegion: &7'
  region-exists: The &f{region} &7already exists.
  region-claim: 'You have claimed a new region: &f{x}:{z}:{world}'
  region-claim-max: You have reached your maximum claims.
  region-claim-null: You have do not have any claimed lands.
  region-claim-other: This already belongs to another person.
  region-claim-self: This region already belongs to you!
  region-null: You do not seem to own a region. Type &f/claim &7to claim some land.
  region-shop-insufficient-funds: 'You do not have enough funds to purchase: &f{name}'
  region-shop-insufficient-claims: You need to purchase more claims from the shop.
  region-shop-insufficient-trusts: You need to purchase more trusted members from
    the shop.
  region-trust: The player &f{player} &7has been trusted.
  region-trust-false: The player &f{player} &7does not seem to be trusted.
  region-trust-null: You do not have any trusted members.
  region-trust-true: The player &f{player} &7is already trusted.
  region-unclaim: 'You have unclaimed a region at: &f{x}:{z}:{world}'
  region-unclaim-all: You have unclaimed all chunks from your region.
  region-unclaim-other: You have can't unclaim a region that belongs to someone else.
  region-unclaim-wilderness: You have can't unclaim a region in the wilderness.
  region-untrust: The player &f{player} &7is not trusted anymore.
  world-guard: You can't claim in a worldguard region...
Menus:
  back:
    title: '&f&lBack'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to go back!'
  claim:
    title: '&a&l{name}'
    lore:
    - ''
    - '&7Biome: &b{biome}'
    - '&7Entities: &b{entities}'
    - ''
    - '&f&oClick to teleport!'
  claims:
    title: '&a&lClaims'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to look at claims.'
  information:
    title: '&e&lInformation'
    lore:
    - '&f&oYour region information.'
    - ''
    - '&7Claimed land: &f{claims}'
    - '&7Trusted Members: &f{members}'
  next:
    title: '&f&lNext'
    lore:
    - '&7Click for next page.!'
  previous:
    title: '&f&lPrevious'
    lore:
    - '&7Click for previous page!'
  settings:
    title: '&b&lSettings'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to edit settings.'
  setting-disabled:
    title: '&c&l{name}'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to &fenable&7.'
  setting-enabled:
    title: '&a&l{name}'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to &fdisable&7.'
  shop:
    title: '&c&lShop'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to open shop.'
  stop-item:
    title: '&b&l{name}'
  shop-item:
    lore:
    - '&7You have &f{amount}&7 of &f{item}&7.'
    - '&7Price: &a${price}'
    - ''
    - '&f&oClick to purchase more!'
  trusted-main:
    title: '&d&lTrusted'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to edit trusted members.'
  trusted:
    title: '&e&l{name}'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to edit'
  unclaim:
    title: '&c&lUnclaim All'
    lore:
    - '&7Click to unclaim all.'
Title:
  general:
    header: '&b&l{player}'
    footer: '&7Welcome to your region.'
  other:
    header: '&d&l{player}'
    footer: '&7A peaceful Region.'
  wilderness:
    header: '&a&lWilderness'
    footer: '&7Fresh new land awaits you.'
